name: Sea Shark Adventure: Shark Simulator Game For Kids
name_original: Sea Shark Adventure: Shark Simulator Game For Kids
description:
After years spreading the panic through the beaches, Bahia Ace villagers have decided to kill all the sharks in the area. The sea is full of mines!

You are the great white shark, the king of the sea. But you'll have to swim very carefully if you want to survive.

Swim as fast as you can, dodge the mines and have fun with this exciting adventure under the sea:
• Different sharks to choose, unblock all of them!
• HD graphics
• Intuitive controls
• Realistic sharks
• Spectacular sound effects
• Play offline too!

Will you be able to keep your shark's fins? Download the game and prove yourself!

Twitter: @Oscarminigames
Facebook: www.facebook.com/OscarMiniGames
